title: PRICE REDUCED - Old Judge "0" Numbered Series - Mike Dorgan 0402 - Skinned
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: PRICE REDUCED - Old Judge "0" Numbered Series - Mike Dorgan 0402 - Skinned
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a skinned Old Judge "0" Numbered Series of Mike Dorgan "0402".  By skinned, I mean, REALLY skinned.  The remaining "card" is paper thin, but it is the real deal.  There are also three small tears that are easily seen in the scans below (two on the right edge, one on the left).

Now that SGC grades rebacked examples, this could be a good project for someone more keen to do such things.

$40 via paypal f/f, check, or M/O. 

First to email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] or PM me with an "I'll take it!" will be the new owner.

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/1887%20Dorgan.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/1887%20Dorgan%20_back_.jpg[/IMG]
